categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Travik was a male major in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. Around 3637 BBY, he was part of the Imperial forces that worked to secure the captured Jedi Temple on the planet Tython after the Empire raided the world, and he commanded the Imperial forces in the Tythonian Gnarls from the ruins of the Gnarls Outpost. However, he was slain defending the Gnarls from Republic forces.

Major Travik appears as the first boss of the Republic version of the Tactical Flashpoint "Assault on Tython," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.7: Invasion. For Imperial players, the second boss is Major Imos, and the two share many of their game mechanics.
